page.title: 18CLUBS-EYNSFORD
page.content: Eynsford has a busy community and provides interests for all tastes and ages. All villagers over 16 are members of Eynsford Village Society which monitors the local environment.Under fives have a play-group and the Scout and Guides movements cater for older children. Walkers can join a Rights of Way Group, there are 5 badminton sessions weekly, 2 keep fit classes and a diet club ! Eynsford Working Men's Club caters for the socially inclined whilst academic interests are met by the Local History Society and musical intrests by the Darent Valley Choir and the Eynsford Concert Band. Eynsfords Womens Institute promotes a wide range of interests, there is a Gardeners Club and the Darent Valley Flower Club. Older members are cared for by the Friendship Guild and have their own lively Darby and Joan club.
